relation: I love spending time with my family
This college offers noth days and evening classes. Its affordable, and some classes are easy to understand others can be challenges.
pageTitle: Yakima Valley Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {62891=YVCC has made me a better person and is going to help me get my degree in sociology one day. I will be graduating with my associates degree in June 2013 and will be transferring to WSU for my maters in sociology. I am the first in my generation to graduate from high school and even go onto college for a better life. I hope i make my family proud and show my sisters and brother that it is possible to have a better life., 121124=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 26939=Cafeteria closes too early 2:30 ish so plan dinner off campus..}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students you can do it! work hard Will learn a lot It looks like a really great school with a good vet tech program! Login to rate or flag the reviews Debora from Yakima, WA 11/30/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 33 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Students who look forward for a good community college experience! Tips for prospective students apply for financial help as soon as possible, if you need a job the school can help you find one fast. Will enjoy being here Will visiting the students and staff were really friendly and motivative Will learn a lot
